TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ServiceHostBase extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject implements class System.IDisposable, class System.ServiceModel.IExtensibleObject`1<class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>
Public MustInherit Class ServiceHostBase Inherits CommunicationObject Implements IDisposable, IExtensibleObject(Of ServiceHostBase)
public ref class ServiceHostBase abstract : System::ServiceModel::Channels::CommunicationObject, IDisposable, System::ServiceModel::IExtensibleObject<System::ServiceModel::ServiceHostBase ^>

summary.span: 扩展 类，以实现可公开自定义编程模型的主机。

span.span: Extends the class to implement hosts that expose custom programming models.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类，创建可提供自定义编程模型的主机。Use the class to create hosts that provide a custom programming model. 编程模型使用的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务类。The Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service programming model uses the class. 针对从此类派生的托管 C++ 用户的特别说明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 将清理代码放入 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）中，而不是放入析构函数中。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用析构函数；它们会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid destructors; they cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用非引用成员；它们可能会导致编译器自动生成 。Avoid non-reference members; they can cause the compiler to auto-generate . - 避免使用终结器；但如果包含一个终结器，则应该禁止显示生成警告并从 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）调用 和终结器本身，以便模拟自动生成的 行为。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior. ## Examples 此示例使用派生自 的 类。This sample uses the class, which is derived from . [!code-csharp[S_SelfHost#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_selfhost/cs/wholeenchilada.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_SelfHost#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_selfhost/vb/wholeenchilada.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过该属性，用户可以扩展 以在构造主机之后提供基址。This property allows users extending to provide the base address after the host is constructed. 可用来向现有的主机添加基址，但如果说明已经初始化，这将引发异常。 can be used to add base addresses to an existing host, but throws an exception if the description is already initialized.

param.name: endpoint
param.span: 服务终结点。

span.span: The service endpoint.

summary.span: 将指定的服务终结点添加到承载服务中。

span.span: Adds the specified service endpoint to the hosted service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法时，服务主机进行的协定说明"通过的配置名称-"验证。When using the method, the service host does a "by-configuration-name" validation on the contract description. 换而言之，主机验证存在于该服务实现的服务协定的配置名称的列表。In other words, the host verifies that exists in the list of configuration names of the service contracts implemented by the service. 如果通过验证中的说明用作，即使从反射的服务是不同。If the validation passes, the description in the is used as it is, even if the reflected from the service is different. 例如，假定 ServiceEndpoint 中的说明和协定说明反映从服务具有相同的名称，但不同的操作行为。As an example, assume that the description in the ServiceEndpoint and the contract description reflected from the service have the same name, but different operation behaviors. 仅"通过的配置名称-"验证的含意为没有任何验证，行为是相同并且有一个更新到一个说明由于另一个说明。The implication of only "by-configuration-name" validation is that there is no validation that the behaviors are the same and there are one updates to one description because of another description. 如果 `address` 是相对的 URI，则 的其中一个基址（取决于绑定协议）会用作终结点的基址。If the `address` is a relative URI, one of the base addresses of the (depending on the binding protocol) is used as the endpoint's base address.

exception.span: 为 。

span.span: is .

exception.span: 主机未处于已创建或打开状态，或者所承载服务没有 。

span.span: The host is not in a Created or an Opening state or there is no for the hosted service.

exception.span: 、 或 属性为 。

summary.span: 关闭所承载服务，包括它们的通道调度程序以及相关的实例上下文和侦听器。

span.span: Closes down the hosted service, including their channel dispatchers and associated instance contexts and listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 执行的操作如下：Calling does the following: - 关闭 的所有输入，这也将关闭它们相关的 实例。Closes all input to , which also closes their associated instances. 这会阻止接受任何新通道。This stops any new channels from being accepting. - 在所有 对象上调用 ，这意味着它们将停止接受新消息。Calls on all objects, which mean they stop accepting new messages. - 等待所有的 对象关闭，如果它们相关的通道完成发送所有挂起消息，这些对象就会关闭。Waits for all objects to close down, which happens when their associated channels finish sending all pending messages. - 关闭与主机相关的 对象。Closes the objects associated with the host.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClosed() cil managed

summary.span: 释放服务主机占用的资源。

span.span: Releases resources used by the service host.

span.span: Opens the channel dispatchers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnOpened() cil managed

summary.span: 获取所承载服务的服务凭据、服务身份验证和授权行为。

span.span: Gets the service credentials,service authentication and authorization behavior for the hosted service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果这些行为在打开服务时进行初始化，将无法更改它们。Once these behaviors are initialized when opening the service, they cannot be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan OpenTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置允许服务主机打开的时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of time allowed for the service host to open.

value.span: ，指定允许服务主机打开的时间间隔。

span.span: The that specifies the interval of time allowed for the service host to open.

exception.span: 值小于零或大于 （2,147,483,647 或以十六进制表示的 0X7FFFFFFF）。

span.span: The value is less than zero or is larger than (2,147,483,647 or, in hexadecimal notation, 0X7FFFFFFF).

exception.span: 主机处于 状态，因此无法修改。

span.span: The host is in a state and cannot be modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭服务主机。

span.span: Closes the service host.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event UnknownMessageReceived As EventHandler(Of UnknownMessageReceivedEventArgs)

summary.span: 接收未知消息时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an unknown message is received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 使用时，公开托管终结点，和一个引发异常，主机将消息传递到事件处理程序。When using , exposing a hosting endpoint, and a exception is thrown, the host passes the message to the event handler. 如果尝试读取此消息引发。If an attempt is made to read this message an is thrown. 异常的说明将显示"此消息不能支持操作，因为它已被读取。"The description of the exception will say "This message cannot support the operation because it has been read." 在提取消息参数时，WCF 基础结构读取的消息。The WCF infrastructure reads the message while extracting the message parameters. 然后将此消息传递给事件处理程序和任何尝试读取它会导致异常。This message is then passed to the event handler and any attempt to read it causes an exception. 如果你需要访问消息中的参数你处理程序承载的终结点，定义使用 MessageContract 的宿主终结点协定并将所需的数据放入消息头。If you need to access message parameters in your handler from a hosting endpoint, define the hosting endpoint contract using MessageContract and place the needed data into a message header. 有关承载终结点的详细信息，请参阅[工作流服务主机可扩展性](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md)For more information about hosting endpoints, see [Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md)
